source:
## This note book contains data transformations using Python (PySpark)

This notebook should not be run on its own, rather it is run as part of the Transforms_Connector notebook
### Load all required libraries

from pyspark.sql.functions import when, col, sum, percent_rank, substring, trim, regexp_replace, length, lower, concat, concat_ws, lit, avg, stddev, upper, mean, to_date, split, date_format, max, coalesce, expr
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
import databricks.koalas as ks
%run Antares_py
%run OEA_py

# stage2 locations defined in the base OEA
source_p = oea.stage2p 
source_np = oea.stage2np

# stage3 locations defined in OEA
destination_p = oea.stage3p
destination_np = oea.stage3np

# stage3 version (eg. pilot)
version = 'pilot'
### Load all tables from stage 2 and stage 3

sourcep = oea.stage2p
source3p = oea.stage3p

# source tables from Stage2
DMPersonDemographic_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/student/DMPersonDemographic_pseudo", format='delta')
EYAnswers_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/EarlyYearsAnswers/EarlyYearsAnswers_pseudo", format='delta')
#EarlyYearsSubTeachers_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/EarlyYearsSubTeachers/EarlyYearsSubTeachers_pseudo", format='delta')


# source tables from Stage3
# General Tables
CompassODSStudentDemoFull = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/CompassODSStudentDemographicFull_pseudo", format='delta')

# Early Years
#EarlyYearsResultsWide_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/EarlyYearsResults_pseudo", format='delta')
#EYResultsYear2Wide_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/EarlyYearsResultsYear2_pseudo", format='delta')

EarlyYearsStudents_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/_FACTODSEarlyYearsStudents", format='delta')

EarlyYearsStudents_ClassIDCleaned_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/_FACTODSEarlyYearsStudents_ClassIDCleaned", format='delta')

EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/_FACTEarlyYearsResultsYear2", format='delta')

EarlyYearsResults_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/_FACTEarlyYearsResults", format='delta')

#Senior Outcomes
SeniorOutcomes_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/StudentLevel_pseudo", format='delta')

# For Correlation visual 
#NAPLAN
naplanonlinestudenttest_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMFactNAPLANOnlineStudentTestResult_pseudo", format='delta')
naplanonlinestudentresult_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMNAPLANOnlineStudentResult_pseudo", format='delta')
naplantest_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMNAPLANTest_pseudo", format='delta')

DIMNAPLANCombinedResultsLatestStudentsActive_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/_DIMNAPLANCombinedResultsLatestStudentsActive", format='delta')

#ACER
patresults_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMFactPATResults_pseudo", format='delta')
pattest_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMPATTest_pseudo", format='delta')
acerstudent_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/DMACERStudent_pseudo", format='delta')
ACERNorms_df = spark.read.load(sourcep + "/ACERNorms/ACERNorms_pseudo", format='delta')

#AE
aeresults_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/AEResultsCombined_pseudo", format='delta')

#Active Students
activestudents_df = spark.read.load(source3p + "/pilot/_FACTActiveStudent", format='delta')
### GET latest AE Results

activeae_df = activestudents_df.join(aeresults_df, [col('GovtCode1') == col('Ceider')], how='left')

aelatest_df = activeae_df.groupby('Subject', 'GovtCode1').agg(max('YearSemesterValue').alias('YearSemesterValue'))

# join back to the original table to get results
finalae_df = aelatest_df.join(activeae_df, on=['Subject', 'GovtCode1', 'YearSemesterValue'], how='left')

finalae_df = finalae_df.select('Subject', 'Ceider', 'Result', 'SKYearLevel', 'YearSemesterDescription')
### GET Latest ACER Results

# join the active students with the acer student table
activeacer_df = activestudents_df.join(acerstudent_df, [col('Ceider') == col('PersistentStudentId')], how='left')

active_patresults_df = activeacer_df.join(patresults_df, on='SKACERStudent', how='inner')

# join the PATTest table (PAT Test types) so we can group the results into the 2 main categories (Maths / Reading)
test_groups_df = active_patresults_df.join(pattest_df, on='SKPATTest', how='inner') #inner join to take only valid tests 

acerlatest_df = test_groups_df.groupby('SummaryGroups', 'Ceider').agg(max('SKYear').alias('SKYear'))

# remove the 'other' category (we only needs maths and reading)
acerlatest_reduced_df = acerlatest_df.filter(acerlatest_df.SummaryGroups != "Other")

# also get the previous result..
# to do that, we take away the latest results from the whole set then calculate the latest results from the remainder 

previous_df = test_groups_df.join(acerlatest_df, on=['SummaryGroups', 'Ceider', 'SKYear'], how='left_anti')

acerprevious_df = previous_df.groupby('SummaryGroups', 'Ceider').agg(max('SKYear').alias('SKYear'))

# again remove the 'other' category as we only want math and reading
acerprevious_reduced_df = acerprevious_df.filter(acerprevious_df.SummaryGroups != "Other")

# join the results tables back to original table 
finalpat_df = acerlatest_df.join(test_groups_df, on=['SummaryGroups', 'Ceider', 'SKYear'], how='left')
previous_finalpat_df = acerprevious_df.join(test_groups_df, on=['SummaryGroups', 'Ceider', 'SKYear'], how='left')

# remove "Other" category
finalpat_df = finalpat_df.filter(finalpat_df.SummaryGroups != "Other")
previous_finalpat_df = previous_finalpat_df.filter(previous_finalpat_df.SummaryGroups != "Other")

# get the previous score, norm and stddev 
previous_finalpat_df = previous_finalpat_df.select('SKPATTest', 'SummaryGroups', 'Ceider', col('ScaleScore').alias('PrevScaleScore'), col('NORMMeanScaledScore').alias('PrevNORMMeanScaledScore'), col('NORMStandardDeviation').alias('PrevNORMStandardDeviation'))

# join with the manual acer norms uploaded data (at the moment this only replaces 2022 data norm and stddev data)
newnorms_df = finalpat_df.join(ACERNorms_df, on=['SKPATTest', 'SKYear', 'SKYearLevel'], how='left')

# replace the existing columns values for Norm and Standard deviation 
replaced_df = newnorms_df.withColumn('newNorm', coalesce(ACERNorms_df['MeanScore'], finalpat_df['NORMMeanScaledScore'] )) \
                            .withColumn('newStdDev', coalesce(ACERNorms_df['StdDev'], finalpat_df['NORMStandardDeviation'] ))

# join the previous score values to the latest 
combined_df = replaced_df.join(previous_finalpat_df, on=['SummaryGroups', 'Ceider'], how='left')

finalpat_df = combined_df.select(finalpat_df['SummaryGroups'], finalpat_df['SKPATTest'], 'Ceider', col('SKYear').alias('ACERSKYear'), 'PrevScaleScore', 'ScaleScore', 'Stanine', col('newNorm').alias('ACERNormScore'), col('newStdDev').alias('ACERNORMStandardDeviation'))

#display(finalpat_df)
### Combine all results

# join acer and naplan tables
naplanacer_df = DIMNAPLANCombinedResultsLatestStudentsActive_df.join(finalpat_df, on='Ceider', how='inner')

# join AE to table
combinedresults_df = naplanacer_df.join(finalae_df, on='Ceider', how='inner')
### Split the DMPersonDemographic into DMStudentDemographic and DMStaffDemographic

# Clean up the table and remove null and unnecessary columns

df = DMPersonDemographic_df.filter(DMPersonDemographic_df.Ceider != -1) \
                .drop("UsualTransport") \
                .drop("ContactNotesBH") \
                .drop("ContactNotesAH") \
                .drop("OrganisationUserId") \
                .drop("ProgramCode") \
                .drop("Disability_YN") \
                .drop("DisabilityFundedInt") \
                .drop("ReceivesESL_YN") \
                .drop("ReceivesESLInt") \
                .drop("RequiresESL_YN") \
                .drop("RequresESLInt") \
                .drop("LBOTE_YN") \
                .drop("LBOTEInt") \
                .drop("AccessRestrictions_YN")

cleaned_df = df.withColumn("ATSIId", when(df.ATSIId > 4, 4).when(df.ATSIId < 1, 4).otherwise(df.ATSIId))

# now split the demographic information into two tables 
DMStudentDemographic_df = cleaned_df.filter((cleaned_df.PersonType == "Student"))
DMStaffDemographic_df = cleaned_df.filter((cleaned_df.PersonType == "Staff"))

# clean up the data of birth column
DMStudentDemographic_df = DMStudentDemographic_df.withColumn("DOB_YearFirstFormat", to_date(col("DateOfBirth")))

DMStudentDemographic_df = DMStudentDemographic_df.withColumn("DOB", date_format("DOB_YearFirstFormat", "dd/MM/yyyy"))

# create a SK ID column 
DMStudentDemographic_df = DMStudentDemographic_df.withColumn("SKLongID", upper(concat_ws("-", split("LastName", " ").getItem(0), split("FirstName", " ").getItem(0), "DOB")))

# remove columns we don't need
DMStudentDemographic_df = DMStudentDemographic_df.drop("DOB_YearFirstFormat", "DOB")

# Create a duplicate student table based on the sklongid from CompassODSStudentDemographics
# this is to be used in the exceptions report

not_duplicate = CompassODSStudentDemoFull.groupBy("SKLongID").count().where('count = 1').drop('count')

CompassODSStudentDemoFull_duplicates = CompassODSStudentDemoFull.join(not_duplicate, on='SKLongID', how='left_anti')
### Create test completion table for Prep and Year 1

# Filter out Prep and Year 1 students
EarlyYearsStudents_Y1_P_df = EarlyYearsStudents_df.filter(
    (col('YearLevel') == 'P') | (col('YearLevel') == '1')
)

# Separate out the Pre and Post tests
PreTest_df = EarlyYearsResults_df.filter(col('TestLevel') == "Pre").select(
    'Year',
    'CampusID',
    'Ceider',
    'ClassID',
    'YearLevel'
).withColumn('PreTestComplete', lit("1"))

PostTest_df = EarlyYearsResults_df.filter(col('TestLevel') == "Post").select(
    'Year',
    'CampusID',
    'Ceider',
    'ClassID',
    'YearLevel'
).withColumn('PostTestComplete', lit("1"))

# Join PreTest and PostTest dataframes onto the student list if not empty
if not PreTest_df.rdd.isEmpty():
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsStudents_Y1_P_df.join(
        PreTest_df,
        on=['Year', 'CampusID', 'Ceider', 'ClassID', 'YearLevel'],
        how="left"
    )
else:
    # If PreTest is empty, assign "0" for PreTestComplete
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsStudents_Y1_P_df.withColumn("PreTestComplete", lit("0"))

if not PostTest_df.rdd.isEmpty():
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.join(
        PostTest_df,
        on=['Year', 'CampusID', 'Ceider', 'ClassID', 'YearLevel'],
        how="left"
    )
else:
    # If PostTest is empty, assign "0" for PostTestComplete
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.withColumn("PostTestComplete", lit("0"))

# Add columns to make the table compatible with the Year 2 table
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.withColumn('PreTestNumeracyComplete', col('PreTestComplete'))
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.withColumn('PreTestLiteracyComplete', col('PreTestComplete'))
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.withColumn('PostTestNumeracyComplete', col('PostTestComplete'))
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.withColumn('PostTestLiteracyComplete', col('PostTestComplete'))

# Sort the columns alphabetically
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.select(*sorted(EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.columns))
print(EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.count())
print(EarlyYearsStudents_df.count())
### Create Test Completion table YEAR 2

# filter out year 2

EarlyYearsStudents_Y2_df = EarlyYearsStudents_df.filter((EarlyYearsStudents_df.YearLevel == '2'))

# Seperate out the Pre/Post and Numeracy/Literacy tests
PreTestNumeracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df.select(col('Year').alias('xYear'), 
                                                col('CampusID').alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                col('Ceider').alias('xCeider'), 
                                                col('ClassID').alias('xClassID'), 
                                                col('YearLevel').alias('xYearLevel')
                                                ).filter((col('TestLevel') == "Pre") & (col('QuestionType') == "Numeracy")) \
                                                .withColumn('PreTestNumeracyComplete', lit("1"))


PreTestLiteracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df.select(col('Year').alias('xYear'), 
                                                col('CampusID').alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                col('Ceider').alias('xCeider'), 
                                                col('ClassID').alias('xClassID'), 
                                                col('YearLevel').alias('xYearLevel')
                                                ).filter((col('TestLevel') == "Pre") & (col('QuestionType') == "Literacy")) \
                                                .withColumn('PreTestLiteracyComplete', lit("1"))


PostTestNumeracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df.select(col('Year').alias('xYear'), 
                                                col('CampusID').alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                col('Ceider').alias('xCeider'), 
                                                col('ClassID').alias('xClassID'), 
                                                col('YearLevel').alias('xYearLevel')
                                                ).filter((col('TestLevel') == "Post") & (col('QuestionType') == "Numeracy")) \
                                                .withColumn('PostTestNumeracyComplete', lit("1"))


PostTestLiteracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df.select(col('Year').alias('xYear'), 
                                                col('CampusID').alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                col('Ceider').alias('xCeider'), 
                                                col('ClassID').alias('xClassID'), 
                                                col('YearLevel').alias('xYearLevel')
                                                ).filter((col('TestLevel') == "Post") & (col('QuestionType') == "Literacy")) \
                                                .withColumn('PostTestLiteracyComplete', lit("1"))


if (not PreTestNumeracy_df.rdd.isEmpty()):
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsStudents_Y2_df.join(PreTestNumeracy_df, 
                                                            [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                            col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                            col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                            col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                            col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel')],
                                                            how="left"
                                                            )

    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.drop('xYear', 'xCampusID', 'xCeider', 'xClassID', 'xYearLevel')

else:
    #if the pre tests are completely empty then assign false to pre test completion for every student 
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsStudents_Y2_df.withColumn("PreTestNumeracyComplete", lit("0"))


if (not PreTestLiteracy_df.rdd.isEmpty()):
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.join(PreTestLiteracy_df, 
                                                                    [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                    col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                    col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                    col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                    col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel')],
                                                                    how="left"
                                                                    )
                                                            
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.drop('xYear', 'xCampusID', 'xCeider', 'xClassID', 'xYearLevel')

else:
    #if the pre tests are completely empty then assign false to pre test completion for every student 
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn("PreTestLiteracyComplete", lit("0"))


if (not PostTestNumeracy_df.rdd.isEmpty()):
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.join(PostTestNumeracy_df, 
                                                                    [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                    col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                    col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                    col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                    col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel')],
                                                                    how="left"
                                                                    )
                                                            
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.drop('xYear', 'xCampusID', 'xCeider', 'xClassID', 'xYearLevel')

else:
    #if the Post tests are completely empty then assign false to Post test completion for every student 
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn("PostTestNumeracyComplete", lit("0"))



if (not PostTestLiteracy_df.rdd.isEmpty()):
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.join(PostTestLiteracy_df, 
                                                                    [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                    col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                    col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                    col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                    col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel')],
                                                                    how="left"
                                                                    )
                                                            
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.drop('xYear', 'xCampusID', 'xCeider', 'xClassID', 'xYearLevel')

else:
    #if the Post tests are completely empty then assign false to Post test completion for every student 
    EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn("PostTestLiteracyComplete", lit("0"))


EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn('PreTestComplete', when( ((col('PreTestNumeracyComplete') == "1") & 
                                                                                                    (col('PreTestLiteracyComplete') == "1")), lit("1")).otherwise(lit("0")) 
                                                                                                
                                                                        )

EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.withColumn('PostTestComplete', when( ((col('PostTestNumeracyComplete') == "1") & 
                                                                                                    (col('PostTestLiteracyComplete') == "1")), lit("1")).otherwise(lit("0")) 
                                                                                                
                                                                        )

# sort the columns
EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.select(sorted(EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df.columns))
# combine the prep/year1 test completion table with the year 2 table
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.union(EarlyYearsTestCompletion2_df)
### Create Results Totals tables (Prep and Year 1)

# Create the early years transformations for aggregate pre/post test results

EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df = EarlyYearsResults_df.groupBy("CampusID", "Ceider",	"ClassID", "Year", "YearLevel", "TestLevel").agg(sum(EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques1+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques2+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques3+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques4+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques5+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques6+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques7+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques8+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques9+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques10+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques11+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques12+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques13+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques14+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques15+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques16+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques17+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques18+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques19+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques20).alias("NumeracyTotal"), 
                                                                                                                sum(EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques21+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques22+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques23+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques24+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques25+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques26+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques27+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques28+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques29+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques30+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques31+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques32+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques33+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques34+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques35+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques36+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques37+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques38+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques39+
                                                                                                                EarlyYearsResults_df.Ques40).alias("LiteracyTotal"))

# add the percent rank based on year, yearlevel, testlevel and numeracy/literacy groups

EarlyYearsResults_Numeracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df.select("CampusID", 
                                                                    "Ceider", 
                                                                    "ClassID", 
                                                                    "Year", 
                                                                    "YearLevel", 
                                                                    "TestLevel", 
                                                                    "NumeracyTotal", 
                                                                    "LiteracyTotal",
                                                                    percent_rank().over(Window.partitionBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['Year'],
                                                                                                            EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['YearLevel'],
                                                                                                            EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['TestLevel'])\
                                                                                                            .orderBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['NumeracyTotal'])).alias("NumeracyPercentile")
                                                                    
                                                                )


EarlyYearsResults_Literacy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df.select(col("CampusID").alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                                    col("Ceider").alias('xCeider'), 
                                                                    col("ClassID").alias('xClassID'), 
                                                                    col("Year").alias('xYear'), 
                                                                    col("YearLevel").alias('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                    col("TestLevel").alias('xTestLevel'), 
                                                                    percent_rank().over(Window.partitionBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['Year'],
                                                                                                            EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['YearLevel'],
                                                                                                            EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['TestLevel'])\
                                                                                                            .orderBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df['LiteracyTotal'])).alias("LiteracyPercentile")
                                                                    
                                                                )


EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Numeracy_df.join(EarlyYearsResults_Literacy_df, 
                                                                    [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                    col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                    col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                    col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                    col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'),
                                                                    col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')],
                                                                    how="outer"
                                                                    )

# merge the values into single column
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newCampusID", when(col("CampusID").isNull(), col("xCampusID")).otherwise(col("CampusID")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newCeider", when(col("Ceider").isNull(), col("xCeider")).otherwise(col("Ceider")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newClassID", when(col("ClassID").isNull(), col("xClassID")).otherwise(col("ClassID")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newYear", when(col("Year").isNull(), col("xYear")).otherwise(col("Year")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newYearLevel", when(col("YearLevel").isNull(), col("xYearLevel")).otherwise(col("YearLevel")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newTestLevel", when(col("TestLevel").isNull(), col("xTestLevel")).otherwise(col("TestLevel")) )

EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.drop("CampusID", "xCampusID", 
                                                                        "Ceider", "xCeider", 
                                                                        "ClassID", "xClassID", 
                                                                        "Year", "xYear", 
                                                                        "YearLevel", "xYearLevel", 
                                                                        "TestLevel", "xTestLevel")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newCampusID", "CampusID")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newCeider", "Ceider")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newClassID", "ClassID")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newYear", "Year")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newYearLevel", "YearLevel")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newTestLevel", "TestLevel")

# numeracy average

num_average_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.groupBy('Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel').agg(avg(EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df['NumeracyTotal']).alias('NumeracyAverage'))

num_average_df = num_average_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('YearLevel', 'xYearLevel').withColumnRenamed('TestLevel', 'xTestLevel')

EarlyYearsResults_NumAverage_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.join(num_average_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'), 
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')], 
                                                                        how='outer')

EarlyYearsResults_NumAverage_df = EarlyYearsResults_NumAverage_df.drop('xYear').drop('xYearLevel').drop('xTestLevel')


# literacy average 

lit_average_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.groupBy('Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel').agg(avg(EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df['LiteracyTotal']).alias('LiteracyAverage'))

lit_average_df = lit_average_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('YearLevel', 'xYearLevel').withColumnRenamed('TestLevel', 'xTestLevel')

EarlyYearsResults_LitAverage_df = EarlyYearsResults_NumAverage_df.join(lit_average_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'), 
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')], 
                                                                        how='outer')

EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df = EarlyYearsResults_LitAverage_df.drop('xYear').drop('xYearLevel').drop('xTestLevel')

# numeracy standard deviation

num_stddev_df = EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df.groupBy('Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel').agg(stddev(EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df['NumeracyTotal']).alias('NumeracyStdDev'))


num_stddev_df = num_stddev_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('YearLevel', 'xYearLevel').withColumnRenamed('TestLevel', 'xTestLevel')

EarlyYearsResults_NumStdDev_df = EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df.join(num_stddev_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'), 
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')], 
                                                                        how='outer')

EarlyYearsResults_NumStdDev_df = EarlyYearsResults_NumStdDev_df.drop('xYear').drop('xYearLevel').drop('xTestLevel')


# literacy average 

lit_stddev_df = EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df.groupBy('Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel').agg(stddev(EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df['LiteracyTotal']).alias('LiteracyStdDev'))

lit_stddev_df = lit_stddev_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('YearLevel', 'xYearLevel').withColumnRenamed('TestLevel', 'xTestLevel')

EarlyYearsResults_LitAverage_df = EarlyYearsResults_NumStdDev_df.join(lit_stddev_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'), 
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')], 
                                                                        how='outer')

EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df = EarlyYearsResults_LitAverage_df.drop('xYear').drop('xYearLevel').drop('xTestLevel')
### Pivot Results from Wide to Long format (PREP and YEAR 1)

id_vars = ['CampusID', 'Ceider', 'Status', 'ClassID', 'Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel']
value_vars = ['Ques1', 'Ques2', 'Ques3', 'Ques4', 'Ques5', 'Ques6', 'Ques7', 'Ques8', 'Ques9', 'Ques10',
            'Ques11', 'Ques12', 'Ques13', 'Ques14', 'Ques15', 'Ques16', 'Ques17', 'Ques18', 'Ques19', 'Ques20',
            'Ques21', 'Ques22', 'Ques23', 'Ques24', 'Ques25', 'Ques26', 'Ques27', 'Ques28', 'Ques29', 'Ques30',
            'Ques31', 'Ques32', 'Ques33', 'Ques34', 'Ques35', 'Ques36', 'Ques37', 'Ques38', 'Ques39', 'Ques40']
var_name = "Question"
value_name = "Result"

EarlyYearsResultsLong_df = unpivot_dataframe(EarlyYearsResults_df, id_vars, value_vars, var_name, value_name)
### Remove the 'Ques' from the Question number in the results table

# extract the numeral from the Ques## column names
EarlyYearsResultsLong_df = EarlyYearsResultsLong_df.withColumn("Question", substring("Question", 5, len("Question")-4))

# Create SKQID to uniquely identify the different year levels (Prep and Year 1)
EarlyYearsResultsLong_df = EarlyYearsResultsLong_df.withColumn("SKQID", concat_ws("-", col('Year'), col('YearLevel'), col('Question')))

# Add the 'QuestionType' column so we can merge with the year 2 results 
EarlyYearsResultsLong_df = EarlyYearsResultsLong_df.withColumn("QuestionType", when(EarlyYearsResultsLong_df['Question'] < 21, lit("Numeracy")).otherwise(lit("Literacy")))

# Add the StudentAnswer and Answer Columns (with NULL values) so that we can merge this with the year 2 results 
EarlyYearsResultsLong_df = EarlyYearsResultsLong_df.withColumn("StudentAnswer", lit("N/A")).withColumn("Answer", lit("N/A"))
### Convert answers table from wide to long format

id_vars=['Year', 'Question']
value_vars=['Numeracy', 'Literacy']
variable_colname = "QuestionType"
value_colname = "Answer"

EYAnswers_df = unpivot_dataframe(EYAnswers_df, id_vars, value_vars, variable_colname, value_colname)
### Pivot Results from Wide to Long format (YEAR 2) + AUTOMARKER

id_vars = ['CampusID', 'Ceider', 'ClassID', 'QuestionType', 'Status', 'Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel']
value_vars = ['Ques1', 'Ques2', 'Ques3', 'Ques4', 'Ques5', 'Ques6', 'Ques7', 'Ques8', 'Ques9', 'Ques10',
            'Ques11', 'Ques12', 'Ques13', 'Ques14', 'Ques15', 'Ques16', 'Ques17', 'Ques18', 'Ques19', 'Ques20',
            'Ques21', 'Ques22', 'Ques23', 'Ques24', 'Ques25']
var_name = "Question"
value_name = "StudentAnswer"

EYResultsYear2Long_df = unpivot_dataframe(EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df, id_vars, value_vars, var_name, value_name)

# # wide to long conversion for year 2 and auto marker

# df = EarlyYearsResultsYear2_df.to_koalas().melt(id_vars=['CampusID', 'Ceider', 'ClassID', 'QuestionType', 'Status', 'Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel'],
#                                             value_vars=['Ques1', 'Ques2', 'Ques3', 'Ques4', 'Ques5', 'Ques6', 'Ques7', 'Ques8', 'Ques9', 'Ques10',
#                                                         'Ques11', 'Ques12', 'Ques13', 'Ques14', 'Ques15', 'Ques16', 'Ques17', 'Ques18', 'Ques19', 'Ques20',
#                                                         'Ques21', 'Ques22', 'Ques23', 'Ques24', 'Ques25'],
#                                             var_name="Question",
#                                             value_name = "StudentAnswer")

# EYResultsYear2Long_df = df.to_spark()

# extract the numeral from the Ques## column names
EYResultsYear2Long_df = EYResultsYear2Long_df.withColumn("Question", substring("Question", 5, len("Question")-4))


# combine the student answers with the actual answers table

EYAnswers_df = EYAnswers_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('Question', 'xQuestion').withColumnRenamed('QuestionType', 'xQuestionType')

joined_df = EYResultsYear2Long_df.join(EYAnswers_df, [col('Year') == col('xYear'), col('Question') == col('xQuestion'), col('QuestionType') == col('xQuestionType')], how='left')

joinedcleaned_df = joined_df.drop('xYear').drop('xQuestion').drop('xQuestionType')

# do the correction by comparing StudentAnswer to the real Answer
EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df = joinedcleaned_df.withColumn('Result', when(trim(lower(joinedcleaned_df.StudentAnswer)) == trim(lower(joinedcleaned_df.Answer)), 1).otherwise(0))

# create the SKQID to uniquely identify between literacy and numeracy test results
EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df = EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df.withColumn('SKQID', when(EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df['QuestionType'] == "Literacy", 
                                                                                concat_ws("-", col('Year'), col('YearLevel'), col('Question'), lit("Lit")))\
                                                                                .otherwise(concat_ws("-", col('Year'), col('YearLevel'), col('Question'), lit("Num")))
                                                                    )
### Create Results Totals tables (YEAR 2)

# create the totals dataframe for year 2

EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Numeracy_df = EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df.filter(EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df.QuestionType == 'Numeracy')

EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Literacy_df = EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df.filter(EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df.QuestionType == 'Literacy')

EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Numeracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Numeracy_df.groupBy("CampusID", "Ceider",	"ClassID", "Year", "YearLevel", "TestLevel").agg(sum(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Numeracy_df.Result).alias("NumeracyTotal"))

EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Literacy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Literacy_df.groupBy("CampusID", "Ceider",	"ClassID", "Year", "YearLevel", "TestLevel").agg(sum(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Literacy_df.Result).alias("LiteracyTotal"))


EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Literacy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Literacy_df.withColumnRenamed("CampusID", "xCampusID")\
                                                                                    .withColumnRenamed("Ceider", "xCeider")\
                                                                                    .withColumnRenamed("ClassID", "xClassID")\
                                                                                    .withColumnRenamed("Year", "xYear")\
                                                                                    .withColumnRenamed("YearLevel", "xYearLevel")\
                                                                                    .withColumnRenamed("TestLevel", "xTestLevel")


# join the numeracy and literacy results 

EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Numeracy_df.join(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Literacy_df, [col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                                                                                col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                                                                                col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                                                                                col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                                                                                col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'),
                                                                                                                                col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')],
                                                                                                                                how="outer")

# merge the values into single column
EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.withColumn("newCampusID", when(col("CampusID").isNull(), col("xCampusID")).otherwise(col("CampusID")) )
EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.withColumn("newCeider", when(col("Ceider").isNull(), col("xCeider")).otherwise(col("Ceider")) )
EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.withColumn("newClassID", when(col("ClassID").isNull(), col("xClassID")).otherwise(col("ClassID")) )
EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.withColumn("newYear", when(col("Year").isNull(), col("xYear")).otherwise(col("Year")) )
EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.withColumn("newYearLevel", when(col("YearLevel").isNull(), col("xYearLevel")).otherwise(col("YearLevel")) )
EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.withColumn("newTestLevel", when(col("TestLevel").isNull(), col("xTestLevel")).otherwise(col("TestLevel")) )

EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.drop("CampusID", "xCampusID", 
                                                                                    "Ceider", "xCeider", 
                                                                                    "ClassID", "xClassID", 
                                                                                    "Year", "xYear", 
                                                                                    "YearLevel", "xYearLevel", 
                                                                                    "TestLevel", "xTestLevel")\
                                                                            .withColumnRenamed("newCampusID", "CampusID")\
                                                                            .withColumnRenamed("newCeider", "Ceider")\
                                                                            .withColumnRenamed("newClassID", "ClassID")\
                                                                            .withColumnRenamed("newYear", "Year")\
                                                                            .withColumnRenamed("newYearLevel", "YearLevel")\
                                                                            .withColumnRenamed("newTestLevel", "TestLevel")

# add the percent rank based on year, yearlevel, testlevel and numeracy/literacy groups

EarlyYearsResultsY2_Numeracy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.select("CampusID", 
                                                                                "Ceider", 
                                                                                "ClassID", 
                                                                                "Year", 
                                                                                "YearLevel", 
                                                                                "TestLevel", 
                                                                                "NumeracyTotal", 
                                                                                "LiteracyTotal",
                                                                                percent_rank().over(Window.partitionBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df['Year'],
                                                                                                                        EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df['YearLevel'],
                                                                                                                        EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df['TestLevel'])\
                                                                                                                        .orderBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df['NumeracyTotal'])).alias("NumeracyPercentile")
                                                                    
                                                                                )

EarlyYearsResultsY2_Literacy_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.select(col("CampusID").alias('xCampusID'), 
                                                                                col("Ceider").alias('xCeider'), 
                                                                                col("ClassID").alias('xClassID'), 
                                                                                col("Year").alias('xYear'), 
                                                                                col("YearLevel").alias('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                                col("TestLevel").alias('xTestLevel'), 
                                                                                percent_rank().over(Window.partitionBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df['Year'],
                                                                                                                        EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df['YearLevel'],
                                                                                                                        EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df['TestLevel'])\
                                                                                                                        .orderBy(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df['LiteracyTotal'])).alias("LiteracyPercentile")
                                            
                                                                                )


EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResultsY2_Numeracy_df.join(EarlyYearsResultsY2_Literacy_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'),
                                                                        col('CampusID') == col('xCampusID'),
                                                                        col('Ceider') == col('xCeider'),
                                                                        col('ClassID') == col('xClassID'),
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'),
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')],
                                                                        how="outer"
                                                                        )

# merge the values into single column
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newCampusID", when(col("CampusID").isNull(), col("xCampusID")).otherwise(col("CampusID")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newCeider", when(col("Ceider").isNull(), col("xCeider")).otherwise(col("Ceider")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newClassID", when(col("ClassID").isNull(), col("xClassID")).otherwise(col("ClassID")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newYear", when(col("Year").isNull(), col("xYear")).otherwise(col("Year")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newYearLevel", when(col("YearLevel").isNull(), col("xYearLevel")).otherwise(col("YearLevel")) )
EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.withColumn("newTestLevel", when(col("TestLevel").isNull(), col("xTestLevel")).otherwise(col("TestLevel")) )

EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.drop("CampusID", "xCampusID", 
                                                                        "Ceider", "xCeider", 
                                                                        "ClassID", "xClassID", 
                                                                        "Year", "xYear", 
                                                                        "YearLevel", "xYearLevel", 
                                                                        "TestLevel", "xTestLevel")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newCampusID", "CampusID")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newCeider", "Ceider")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newClassID", "ClassID")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newYear", "Year")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newYearLevel", "YearLevel")\
                                                                .withColumnRenamed("newTestLevel", "TestLevel")

# numeracy average

num_average_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.groupBy('Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel').agg(avg(EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df['NumeracyTotal']).alias('NumeracyAverage'))

num_average_df = num_average_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('YearLevel', 'xYearLevel').withColumnRenamed('TestLevel', 'xTestLevel')

EarlyYearsResults_NumAverage_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.join(num_average_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'), 
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')], 
                                                                        how='outer')

EarlyYearsResults_NumAverage_df = EarlyYearsResults_NumAverage_df.drop('xYear').drop('xYearLevel').drop('xTestLevel')


# literacy average 

lit_average_df = EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df.groupBy('Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel').agg(avg(EarlyYearsResults_Percentile_df['LiteracyTotal']).alias('LiteracyAverage'))

lit_average_df = lit_average_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('YearLevel', 'xYearLevel').withColumnRenamed('TestLevel', 'xTestLevel')

EarlyYearsResults_LitAverage_df = EarlyYearsResults_NumAverage_df.join(lit_average_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'), 
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')], 
                                                                        how='outer')

EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df = EarlyYearsResults_LitAverage_df.drop('xYear').drop('xYearLevel').drop('xTestLevel')

# numeracy standard deviation

num_stddev_df = EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df.groupBy('Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel').agg(stddev(EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df['NumeracyTotal']).alias('NumeracyStdDev'))


num_stddev_df = num_stddev_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('YearLevel', 'xYearLevel').withColumnRenamed('TestLevel', 'xTestLevel')

EarlyYearsResults_NumStdDev_df = EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df.join(num_stddev_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'), 
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')], 
                                                                        how='outer')

EarlyYearsResults_NumStdDev_df = EarlyYearsResults_NumStdDev_df.drop('xYear').drop('xYearLevel').drop('xTestLevel')


# literacy average 

lit_stddev_df = EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df.groupBy('Year', 'YearLevel', 'TestLevel').agg(stddev(EarlyYearsResults_Averages_df['LiteracyTotal']).alias('LiteracyStdDev'))

lit_stddev_df = lit_stddev_df.withColumnRenamed('Year', 'xYear').withColumnRenamed('YearLevel', 'xYearLevel').withColumnRenamed('TestLevel', 'xTestLevel')

EarlyYearsResults_LitAverage_df = EarlyYearsResults_NumStdDev_df.join(lit_stddev_df, 
                                                                        [col('Year') == col('xYear'), 
                                                                        col('YearLevel') == col('xYearLevel'), 
                                                                        col('TestLevel') == col('xTestLevel')], 
                                                                        how='outer')

EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df = EarlyYearsResults_LitAverage_df.drop('xYear').drop('xYearLevel').drop('xTestLevel')
### Join Prep/Year 1 and Year 2 datasets (Results totals)

# join the prep/year 1 and year 2 totals table together (union)

EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df.union(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df)
### Combine the Prep/Year 1 and Year 2 student test results

# sort the columns for both tables
EY_Results_Sorted_df = EarlyYearsResultsLong_df.select(sorted(EarlyYearsResultsLong_df.columns))
EY_ResultsYear2_Sorted_df = EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df.select(sorted(EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df.columns))

# combine the tables with a union 
EarlyYearsResultsCombined_df = EY_Results_Sorted_df.union(EY_ResultsYear2_Sorted_df)

# create unique ID's
EarlyYearsResultsCombined_df = EarlyYearsResultsCombined_df.withColumn("SKResultID", concat_ws("-", col("CampusID"), col("Year"), col("YearLevel"), upper(regexp_replace(col("ClassID"), " ", ""))))
EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.withColumn("SKResultID", concat_ws("-", col("CampusID"), col("Year"), col("YearLevel"), upper(regexp_replace(col("ClassID"), " ", ""))))
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.withColumn("SKResultID", concat_ws("-", col("CampusID"), col("Year"), col("YearLevel"), upper(regexp_replace(col("ClassID"), " ", ""))))

# create ClassID Dimension
EarlyYearsClassID_df = EarlyYearsResultsCombined_df.select(col("SKResultID"), col("CampusID"), col("Year"), col("YearLevel"), col("ClassID")).distinct()

# clean up the unwanted columns 
EarlyYearsResultsCombined_df = EarlyYearsResultsCombined_df.drop("CampusID", "Year", "YearLevel", "ClassID")
EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.drop("CampusID", "Year", "YearLevel", "ClassID")
EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df = EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df.drop("CampusID", "Year", "YearLevel", "ClassID")
### Create growth effect table for numeracy and literacy

# groupby year and the student and get post score - pre score
NumeracyPivot_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.groupby("SKResultID", "Ceider").pivot("TestLevel").agg({"NumeracyTotal": "first"})

NumeracyDiff_df = NumeracyPivot_df.withColumn("Numeracydiff", col("Post") - col("Pre")).select("SKResultID", "Ceider", "NumeracyDiff")

# same thing for literacy
LiteracyPivot_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.groupby("SKResultID", "Ceider").pivot("TestLevel").agg({"LiteracyTotal": "first"})

LiteracyDiff_df = LiteracyPivot_df.withColumn("Literacydiff", col("Post") - col("Pre")).select("SKResultID", "Ceider", "LiteracyDiff")

JoinedResultDiff_df = NumeracyDiff_df.join(LiteracyDiff_df, ['SKResultID', 'Ceider'], 'inner')

# same again for the standard deviation values
StdDevNumeracyPivot_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.groupby("SKResultID", "Ceider").pivot("TestLevel").agg({"NumeracyStdDev": "first"})
StdDevNumeracyDiff_df = StdDevNumeracyPivot_df.withColumn("NumeracyStdDevAverage", ((col("Post") + col("Pre")) / 2)).select("SKResultID", "Ceider", "NumeracyStdDevAverage")

StdDevLiteracyPivot_df = EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df.groupby("SKResultID", "Ceider").pivot("TestLevel").agg({"LiteracyStdDev": "first"})
StdDevLiteracyDiff_df = StdDevLiteracyPivot_df.withColumn("LiteracyStdDevAverage", ((col("Post") + col("Pre")) / 2)).select("SKResultID", "Ceider", "LiteracyStdDevAverage")

JoinedStdDevDiff_df = StdDevNumeracyDiff_df.join(StdDevLiteracyDiff_df, ['SKResultID', 'Ceider'], 'inner')

growth_df = JoinedResultDiff_df.join(JoinedStdDevDiff_df, ['SKResultID', 'Ceider'], 'inner')

growth_df = growth_df.withColumn("NumeracyGrowthValue", col('NumeracyDiff')/col('NumeracyStdDevAverage'))
growth_df = growth_df.withColumn("LiteracyGrowthValue", col('LiteracyDiff')/col('LiteracyStdDevAverage'))
growth_df = growth_df.select('SKResultID', 'Ceider', 'NumeracyGrowthValue', 'LiteracyGrowthValue')
### Senior Outcomes transformation

# create a new SAT Column (SBA) that provides counts instead of codes. 
# Codes in the file are N - None, A - Apprenticeship, T - Traineeship

SeniorOutcomes_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.withColumn("SBA", when(SeniorOutcomes_df.sat == "N", lit(0)).otherwise(lit(1)))


# Add GenderSifCode and AtsiSifId so we can connect this table to the filter tables 
SeniorOutcomes_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.withColumn("GenderSifCode", when(SeniorOutcomes_df.sex == "F", "2")
                                                                .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.sex == "M", "1")
                                                                .otherwise("9")
                                                )


SeniorOutcomes_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.withColumn("AtsiSifId", when(SeniorOutcomes_df.indigenous == "A", "1")
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.indigenous == "T", "2")
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.indigenous == "B", "3")
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.indigenous == "N", "4")
                                                            .otherwise("9")
                                                )


# replace the school column with CampusID - so we can connect to the school table

SeniorOutcomes_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.withColumn("CampusID", when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "Burdekin Catholic High School (Ayr)", 17240)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "Columba Catholic College (Hackett Tce - Charters Towers)", 17253)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "Gilroy Santa Maria College (Ingham)", 17227)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "Good Shepherd Catholic College (Mount Isa)", 17223)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "Ryan Catholic College (Kirwan)", 2529)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "Southern Cross Catholic College (Townsville)", 15370)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "St Anthony's Catholic College (Veales Rd and Joanne St - Deeragun)", 13492)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "St Catherine's Catholic College The Whitsundays (Proserpine)", 550)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "St Margaret Mary's College (Hyde Park)", 17225)
                                                            .when(SeniorOutcomes_df.school == "St Teresa's College (Abergowrie)", 17247)
                                                )

# remove the school column as it is not needed once we have CampusID
SeniorOutcomes_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.drop('school')

# convert from wide to long format
SO_df = SeniorOutcomes_df.to_koalas().melt(id_vars=['SKLongID', 'year', 'CampusID', 'last_name', 'given_names', 'sex', 'birth_date', 'indigenous', 'qcia', 'qce', 'vet'],
                                            value_vars=['certs_i', 'certs_ii', 'certs_iii', 'certs_iv', 'diplomas', 'adv_diplomas', 'SBA', 'uni_subjects'],
                                            var_name="CertificationType",
                                            value_name = "CertsAchieved")

SeniorOutcomesLong_df = SO_df.to_spark()
### Save the new tables

# Demographics tables 
saveToTarget(DMStudentDemographic_df, destination_p, f'{version}/DMStudentDemographic_pseudo')
saveToTarget(DMStaffDemographic_df, destination_p, f'{version}/DMStaffDemographic_pseudo')
saveToTarget(CompassODSStudentDemoFull_duplicates, destination_p, f'{version}/CompassODSStudentDemographicFullDuplicates_pseudo')

# remove in next version 
#saveToTarget(EarlyYearsResultsLong_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsResultsLong_pseudo')
#saveToTarget(EarlyYearsResultsTotals_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsResultsTotals_pseudo')

# remove in next version 
#saveToTarget(EYResultsYear2LongFinal_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsResultsYear2Long_pseudo')
#saveToTarget(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsResultsTotalsYear2Joined_pseudo')

# Test result tables for all years 
saveToTarget(EarlyYearsResultsCombined_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsResultsCombined_pseudo')

# Test result totals (for all years)
saveToTarget(EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombined_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsResultsTotalsCombinedYears_pseudo')

# Test completion tables 
saveToTarget(EarlyYearsTestCompletion_df, destination_p, f'{version}/EarlyYearsTestCompletion_pseudo')

# Early Years ClassID Dimension
saveToTarget(EarlyYearsClassID_df, destination_p, f'{version}/DMEarlyYearsClassID_pseudo')

# Early Years Growth calculations
